South Africa asks World Court for more measures against IsraelSouth Africa has asked the International Court of Justice (ICJ) to order additional emergency measures against Israel, which it says is breaching the measures already in place, the U.N.'s top court said on Wednesday. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 19:39:02 GMT OU5E3CA44ZNNTEQK7HC3VMPSF4 https://www.reuters.com/world/south-africa-asks-world-court-more-measures-against-israel-2024-03-06/Reuters世界
Aid trucks entering Gaza must double to meet basic needs, WFP saysThe number of humanitarian aid convoys entering Gaza daily must at least double to meet some of the population's most basic needs, the World Food Programme (WFP) said on Wednesday. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 19:34:41 GMT KMYYI2TT7BMJ5JE62KH6CYRT4E https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/aid-trucks-entering-gaza-must-double-meet-basic-needs-wfp-says-2024-03-06/Reuters世界中东
Mexican navy helicopter accident kills 3, another 2 missingThe Mexican navy said on Wednesday that three people were dead and two more were missing after a helicopter accident earlier in the day. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 19:31:08 GMT CRE7ESV7L5OYHEGERUIG22JEWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexican-navy-helicopter-accident-kills-3-another-2-missing-2024-03-06/Reuters世界美洲
Likely La Nina return ahead stokes farmer worries in ArgentinaThe high probability of a strong La Nina arriving by October has put grains farmers on alert in Argentina, where the climate phenomenon usually brings dry weather with lower rainfall, the Rosario grains exchange said on Wednesday. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 19:15:16 GMT RBMMPHH4F5PBRNMSM7IQTQI6GE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/likely-la-nina-return-ahead-stokes-farmer-worries-argentina-2024-03-06/Maximilian Heath可持续发展气候与能源
Peru votes to bring back twin chambers of Congress after 30 yearsPeru's Congress on Wednesday passed a final vote for both chambers of the legislature to return to session, after more than three decades of operating with just one legislative body. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 19:10:16 GMT YJU3PVOCOFJJZKIFLV2TUVGIUE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/peru-votes-bring-back-twin-chambers-congress-after-30-years-2024-03-06/Reuters世界美洲
US Democrats question arms to Israel over Gaza concernsU.S. President Joe Biden's administration faced growing calls from his fellow Democrats on Wednesday to push Israel to ease the devastating humanitarian crisis in Gaza, with some saying they may try to stop military assistance if conditions for civilians do not improve. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 18:58:43 GMT IGALSEANJJMRHBBZAZ7TUQZDCM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-democrats-question-arms-israel-over-gaza-concerns-2024-03-06/Patricia Zengerle世界美国
Special visa program for US-affiliated Afghans faces demiseA program that resettles in the United States Afghans who worked with the U.S. government could grind to a halt later this year, stranding tens of thousands who are at risk of Taliban retribution following the 2021 U.S. troop pullout from Afghanistan. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 18:16:09 GMT IHW6ZGWA2FMY3LK5OXX5OXJSEA https://www.reuters.com/world/us/special-visa-program-us-affiliated-afghans-faces-demise-2024-03-06/Jonathan Landay世界美国
Ukraine aims to conduct counter-offensive actions in 2024, top commander saysThe Ukrainian military will stabilize the battlefield situation shortly and aims to form units for counter-offensive actions later this year, a top military commander said on Wednesday. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 18:02:33 GMT BCCS4WHFEVPWXOYJMC6WPFM3HE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-aims-conduct-counter-offective-actions-2024-top-commander-says-2024-03-06/Reuters世界欧洲
Brazil's Lula ready to sign EU-Mercosur deal, despite France's growing oppositionBrazil's President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, who met with Spain's Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez in Brasilia on Wednesday, said he is ready to sign an agreement between South American trade bloc Mercosur and the European Union despite growing opposition from France. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 17:58:47 GMT YCSBHEIFGFKQ3LTFN3K5AEKHC4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazils-lula-ready-sign-eu-mercosur-deal-despite-frances-having-opposition-2024-03-06/Reuters世界美洲
With police absent in Gaza, vigilante groups arrive on the streetsHeads turned as the masked men with clubs walked down a Rafah street, part of a vigilante public security group set up by armed factions in Gaza after the civil police force went underground saying it was targeted by Israeli strikes. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 17:57:05 GMT IVTVGC37QBJNHF7IQEDTZHSIUA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/with-police-absent-gaza-vigilante-groups-arrive-streets-2024-03-06/Mohammad Salem, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东
Protesters knock down door of Mexico's presidential palaceA group protesting the disappearance of 43 students in Mexico in 2014 knocked down a door to the country's presidential palace, video from local television stations showed on Wednesday morning. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 15:47:08 GMT YZDDA24QXRIYHLDBWPNKV4TOIM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/protesters-knock-down-door-mexicos-presidential-palace-local-media-2024-03-06/Raquel Cunha世界美洲
